title: Gold Support Main (Me), Looking for OCE  Open Ladder team (Can fill roles)

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: I am a thresh/blitz main, and can play a wide variety of other supports. Although, i can play almost any role if needed.

replies.body:
Hey dude, hit me in game - Drew Carry.

We are looking at forming a high silver/gold+ team for open league.

Hit me up in game and we can talk more.
